description: Cypress : https://www.infineon.com/ Cypress Bluetooth Mesh SDK BSA0107_05.01.00-BX8-AMESH-08 is affected by: Buffer Overflow. The impact is: execute arbitrary code (remote). The component is: affected function is lower_transport_layer_on_seg. ¶¶ In Cypress Bluetooth Mesh SDK, there is an out-of-bound write vulnerability that can be triggered by sending a series of segmented packets with inconsistent SegN.
